definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
benzaldehyde C6H5CHO, the simplest aromatic aldehyde

sentences.english: Silver-coated carbonyl iron powder was prepared by using electroless plating method.
sentences.chinese: 用化學鍍法，甲醛爲還原劑，製備鍍銀羰基鐵粉。

sentences.english: But formaldehyde is virulent, that must do a great harm to the persons.
sentences.chinese: 因爲甲醛有劇毒，會對人體造成很大的傷害。

sentences.english: The percentage of nitrogen in ammonium nitrate can be determined by titrimetry with standard NaOH solution.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果表明，硝酸銨可以與甲醛進行定量反應。

sentences.english: Raw materials are n-butyl aldehyde and formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 基本原料都是正丁醛和甲醛。

sentences.english: The formaldehyde was a main factor influencing the indoor air quality of rural local-style dwelling houses.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛是影響農村民居室內空氣質量的主要因素。

sentences.english: Objective To study Optimization of the react conditions of benzyloxy-benzaldehyde synthesized under microwave irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微波合成苄氧基苯甲醛的最佳反應條件。

sentences.english: Color reaction with acetylacetone is used to determine the formaldehyde content in fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 織物中甲醛的測定大多采用乙酰丙酮的顯色反應。

sentences.english: So to prepare natural benzaldehyde under the conditions is available and the recovery is steady.
sentences.chinese: 故該條件下製備天然苯甲醛可行，收率穩定。

sentences.english: There are many factors affecting formaldehyde release from MDF.
sentences.chinese: 影響中密度纖維板甲醛釋放的原因較多。

sentences.english: Spider plants are among those that were found to be most effective in removing formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 吊蘭是業已發現最能有效去除甲醛的植物之一。

sentences.english: Benzaldehyde and benzyl alcohol are main volatile flavor compounds in Agaricus blazei.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲醛和苯甲醇是姬松茸中的主要風味物質。

sentences.english: Objective To decrease the formalin content in the reused dialyzer and reduce the patients' cost.
sentences.chinese: 目的減少複用透析器中的甲醛含量，降低病人費用。

sentences.english: The polyformaldehyde production includes two processes: homopolymerization and co-polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 聚甲醛有均聚和共聚兩種生產方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, one kind of aqueous polyurethane (PU) is prepared from isophorone diisocyanate (IPDI), dibutyltin …
sentences.chinese: 低甲醛水性聚氨酯抗皺整理劑的製備與應用。

sentences.english: FREE of Dyes, Perfume, Lanolin, Parabens and Formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 不含染料，香水，羊毛脂，對羥基苯甲酸酯和甲醛。
